songs.title: Summer Love*
songs.lyrics:
Verse 01

Sometimes love judges me
This was the moment when it hit me that I have a summer love
And it's you, every night by your side
It seemed like I was born to you
I felt you intensely, because I knew clearly that you had been all my mistakes

Refrain

I had missed this summer love
I saw an intense breeze on my feet
The bed with roses was the best thing I had seen
